summary: TV adaptation of the campy 1960s Broadway musical about the Man of Steel, his friends, his enemies, and his self-image problems.
cast: Kenneth Mars|Loretta Swit|Lesley Ann Warren|David Wayne|David Wilson|Phil Leeds|Harvey Lembeck|Allen Ludden|Al Molinaro|Malachi Throne|Lou Wills Jr.|Danny Goldman|Geoffrey Horne|George Chandler|Irene Tedrow|Stuart Goetz|Michael Lembeck|Joanna Kerns|Gary Owens
keywords: based on musical|newspaper reporter|female reporter|newspaper editor|mad scientist
title: It's a Bird... It's a Plane... It's Superman!
